entry.title: Heartfelt
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 1476.00

Customized Bear with Three White Roses

We sometimes forget to say "sorry" to those we've hurt badly.  Send your deepest apologies and mend the broken relationship. Saying sorry should be this easy. Send a peace offering now!


Flowers are arranged in exclusive Island Rose packaging and delivered in special gift boxes. Special add-on gift items are available upon checkout.

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery fees. Happy Shopping!

*Our priority is to deliver your flowers on time! If certain flowers unexpectedly become unavailable, Island Rose will replace them with flowers of equal or greater value.

**Due to COVID-19, deliveries are limited to Metro Manila and a few provinces. Please refer to our home page and social media or email us for updates.

entry.title: Messenger Bear™ Ivory White
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 950.00

Teddy Bear with customizable Message

Messenger Bear™! Each bear is 12 inches tall (seated) and is made of the highest quality light brown fabric. This extra cuddly bear comes with hand-embroidered messages of your choice to fit any occasion.You can choose from the following messages: I Love You, I Miss You, Happy Birthday, Happy Anniversary, I'm Sorry, Get Well Soon, Thank You and Congratulations.

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery fees. Happy Shopping!
